name: Energy Tail
description:
Energy Tail is an oldschool arcade game where you fight enemies in relentless arena battles. You take control over a blue vectoid, which tries to stop the invasion of enemy vectoids into its realm. To defeat its enemies, the blue vectoid is able to create a deadly tail while moving, allowing it to let the enemies crash into its tail. However, the same is true for the enemy vectoids.
The tron-inspired mechanic is simple to learn and hard to master, allowing for fast-paced arcade action that demands precision as well as quick reactions.
Can you seal the breaches and stop the invasion?

  • Fast-paced arcade action that requires quick reactions and high precision
  • Simple game mechanics that are easy to learn and hard to master
  • An abstract realm with elegant graphics
  • 3 hand-crafted difficulty levels
  • The hard difficulty poses a real challenge
  • 20 levels offering a variety of enemy types
  • Endless mode
